name: SiYuan
spanningEventDesc: Set end date for multi-day events, leave empty for single-day events
noTimeDesc: All day reminder if no time is set
noTimeDescLeaveEmpty: Leave empty for all day reminder
confirmDeleteSession: Are you sure you want to delete this Pomodoro record?
confirmDelete: Are you sure to delete? This action cannot be undone.
batchSetReminderDesc: Will set the same reminder time for the following ${count} blocks
pleaseSetStartDateForRepeat: Please set a start date to create a repeating reminder
endDateCannotBeEarlier: End date cannot be earlier than start date
endDateAdjusted: End date has been automatically adjusted to start date
saveReminderFailed: Failed to save reminder, please try again
deleteReminderFailed: Failed to delete reminder, please try again
setPriorityFailed: Failed to set priority, please try again
openNoteFailed: Failed to open note, the block may have been deleted
blockNotExist: Selected note block does not exist, cannot create reminder
cannotGetNoteContent: Cannot get note content, the block may have been deleted
batchSetFailed: Batch set reminders failed, please try again
batchSaveFailed: Batch save reminders failed, please try again
noteBlockDeleted: The note block may have been deleted. Do you want to delete related reminders?
openModifyDialogFailed: Failed to open modify dialog, please try again
selectBlockFirst: Please select a block in the document first, then create a reminder for it
syncBlockTitle: Update title to bound block content
syncTitleToBlock: Update bound block content to current title
ebbinghausDesc: Memory review pattern based on Ebbinghaus forgetting curve
confirmDeleteInstance: Are you sure to delete this instance of the recurring event?
deleteInstanceNotImplemented: Delete single repeat instance feature not yet implemented
cannotMoveRepeatInstance: Cannot move repeat event instance, please edit the original event
cannotResizeRepeatInstance: Cannot resize repeat event instance, please edit the original event
editingInstanceDesc: Editing a single instance of recurring event. Changes will only affect this occurrence.
toggleAllDayFailed: Failed to toggle all day event
confirmSkipFirstOccurrence: Are you sure to skip the first occurrence? The recurring event will start from the next cycle.
firstOccurrenceSkipped: First occurrence skipped, recurring event will start from the next cycle
confirmResetCategories: Are you sure to reset categories to default? This will delete all custom categories.
confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure to delete the category "${name}"? This action cannot be undone.
loadCategoriesFailed: Failed to load categories. Please try again.
saveCategoriesFailed: Failed to save categories. Please try again.
deleteCategoryFailed: Failed to delete category. Please try again.
resetCategoriesFailed: Failed to reset categories. Please try again.
notificationSoundDesc: Set the sound file path for reminders, leave empty for silent mode
pomodoroWorkDurationDesc: Set the duration of pomodoro work phase, default 25 minutes
pomodoroBreakDurationDesc: Set the duration of pomodoro short break phase, default 5 minutes
pomodoroLongBreakDurationDesc: Set the duration of pomodoro long break phase, default 30 minutes
pomodoroLongBreakIntervalDesc: Set how many pomodoros before automatically entering long break mode, default 4 pomodoros
pomodoroAutoModeDesc: (For countdown pomodoro only) When enabled, work timer automatically enters break timer after completion, break automatically starts work timer, and automatically enters long break mode based on set interval
dailyFocusGoalDesc: Set daily focus goal duration (hours), 0 means no progress display
backgroundVolumeDesc: Set the volume of pomodoro background music, range 0-1
pomodoroWorkSoundDesc: Set the background sound file path during work, leave empty for silent
pomodoroBreakSoundDesc: Set the background sound file path during break, leave empty for silent
pomodoroLongBreakSoundDesc: Set the background sound file path during long break, leave empty for silent
pomodoroWorkEndSoundDesc: Set the notification sound file path when pomodoro work phase ends, leave empty for silent
pomodoroBreakEndSoundDesc: Set the notification sound file path when pomodoro break phase ends, leave empty for silent
randomNotificationEnabledDesc: Play random rest sounds at intervals during pomodoro, followed by micro-breaks. Uses interval effect and random rewards to improve focus and work efficiency.
randomNotificationMinIntervalDesc: Set the minimum interval for random rest sounds, default 3 minutes
randomNotificationMaxIntervalDesc: Set the maximum interval for random rest sounds, default 5 minutes
randomNotificationBreakDurationDesc: Micro break time after random rest sound, end notification plays after this time, default 10 seconds
randomNotificationSoundsDesc: Set the random rest sound file path during pomodoro, leave empty to disable
randomNotificationEndSoundDesc: Set the notification sound file path after random rest ends, leave empty for no sound
randomNotificationSystemNotificationDesc: Show system notification when random rest plays, reminding to start break and end break
deleteReminderConfirm:
Are you sure to delete this reminder?
Title: ${title}
Date: ${date}
deleteRepeatInstanceConfirm:
Are you sure to delete this repeat reminder instance?
Title: ${title}
Date: ${date}
editingInstanceDescription: Editing first occurrence will split the recurring series. A new series will start from the next cycle.
exampleInputs: e.g.: tomorrow 3pm, next Friday, in 3 days, etc.
applyToSelected: Will apply to all selected blocks
cannotRecognize: ‚ùå Cannot recognize date time, please try other expressions
pomodoroSystemNotificationDesc: Show system notification popup when pomodoro session ends
reminderSystemNotificationDesc: Show system notification popup when events are due, supports clicking to jump to related blocks
dailyNotificationTimeDesc: Set the time of day (HH:MM) to show daily reminders (e.g., '09:00'); default is 08:00
dailyNotificationEnabledDesc: Show a unified daily summary notification of all-day items at the specified time. When disabled, daily reminder notifications will not be displayed
dailyRemindersMessage: You have ${overdue} overdue items and ${today} today's items
randomRest: Please take a ${duration}s break and then continue working.
pomodoroHintDesc: See my article "In-depth Guide to Pomodoro Technique"
pomodoroStopConfirmContent: Detected you've focused for ${minutes} minutes. Save this session as a Pomodoro?
pomodoroWindowUpdated: Pomodoro timer updated in standalone window
pomodoroSettingsApplied: Pomodoro settings applied to open timers
pomodoroDockPositionDesc: Set the position of the docked Pomodoro timer window
autoDetectDateTimeDesc: Automatically detect date and time information in block content when creating reminders, supports natural language expressions like 'tomorrow 3pm', 'next Friday', etc.
removeDateAfterDetection: Remove date from title after detection
removeDateAfterDetectionDesc: Automatically remove recognized date and time description text from the task title
defaultHeadingLevelDesc: Set the default heading level (1-6) for new headings, default is 3
defaultHeadingPositionDesc: Set the default position for new headings, prepend means at the top of the document, append means at the bottom
taskStatsDeleteUnsupported: Task stats does not support deleting records yet
addedToProjectSuccess: Successfully added ${count} blocks to the project
saveStatusFailed: Failed to save status, please try again
confirmDeleteStatus: Are you sure to delete the status "${name}"?
confirmResetStatuses: Are you sure to reset the status list to default? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteMilestone: Are you sure you want to delete milestone "${name}"?
dataStorageLocationDesc:
All plugin data (task reminders, project management, pomodoro records, etc.) is stored in:
data/storage/petal/siyuan-plugin-task-note-management
openDataFolderDesc: Click the button to open the data storage folder in file manager
lunarDateDesc: The corresponding Gregorian date will be automatically calculated based on the lunar date
invalidLunarDay: Invalid lunar day, please enter a value between 1-30
clickToJumpToNote: Click to jump to project note
listCreationPlaceholder:
Example:
- Complete project documentation @priority=high&startDate=2025-08-12&endDate=2025-08-15
  - Requirements document
  - Technical design
    - Architecture design
    - Interface design
- Prepare meeting materials @priority=medium&startDate=2025-08-13
  - PPT creation
  - Data organization
- [SiYuan Note Plugin Development‰∏®Task Note Management Plugin](siyuan://blocks/20250610000808-3vqwuh3)
- Learn new technology @priority=low
confirmDeleteRepeat: Are you sure you want to delete all instances of the recurring task "${title}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteTask: Are you sure you want to delete task "${title}"? This action cannot be undone.
includesNSubtasks: This task includes ${count} subtasks (including multi-level subtasks), which will also be deleted.
switchAndInherit: Switch task and inherit current progress
stopwatchPomodoroInherit: Switched to stopwatch mode and inherited ${phase} progress
switchToStopwatchWithInherit: Switched to stopwatch mode and inherited ${phase} progress
pomodoroUnavailable: Unable to start Pomodoro: plugin instance unavailable
blockIdFormat: Supports block ID or block reference format, e.g.: ((blockId 'title'))
enterBlockIdOrPasteRef: Enter block ID or paste block reference
invalidBlockId: Please enter a valid block ID or block reference
originalRecurringEvent: Original recurring event does not exist
confirmDeleteInstanceOf: Are you sure you want to delete the instance of recurring task "${title}" on ${date}?
taskSetAsSubtask: "{childTitle}" has been set as a subtask of "{parentTitle}"
clickToJumpToProjectNote: Click to jump to project note
clickToJumpToBoundBlock: Click to jump to bound block: ${title}
todayStartDesc: Set the start of a day, e.g. 03:00. Records before this time count for the previous day
createDocumentAndBindNote: Create Document and Bind as Project Note
createFromListDesc: Paste Markdown list or multi-line text, each line will create a task. Supports multi-level lists to automatically create parent-child tasks.
multiLevelSupport: Multi-level support: Use indentation or multiple - symbols to create parent-child task relationships
bindBlockIdHint: After binding a block, click the group title to jump to the corresponding block, and support hover preview
clickToJumpToBlock: Click to jump to the bound block
confirmDeleteGroup: Are you sure to delete group "${name}"?
groupHasTasks: This group has ${count} tasks, please choose how to handle:
groupDeletedTasksUngrouped: Group deleted, ${count} tasks set as ungrouped
groupDeletedTasksMoved: Group deleted, ${count} tasks moved to new group
pasteBlockRefSuccess: Successfully pasted and parsed block information
pasteBlockRefFailed: Failed to parse block information from clipboard content
enableReminderDockDesc: Show or hide the Task (Reminder) panel in the sidebar
enableProjectDockDesc: Show or hide the Project panel (Kanban) in the sidebar
enableHabitDockDesc: Show or hide the Habit tracking panel in the sidebar
enableDockBadgeDesc: Show or hide numeric badge counters on sidebar icons (reminder/project/habit)
enableReminderDockBadgeDesc: Show or hide the numeric badge counter on the Reminder/Task sidebar icon
enableProjectDockBadgeDesc: Show or hide the numeric badge counter on the Project sidebar icon
enableHabitDockBadgeDesc: Show or hide the numeric badge counter on the Habit sidebar icon
weekStartDayDesc: Set the start day of the week for week view
calendarShowCategoryAndProjectDesc: Show category icon and project name in calendar view
calendarShowLunarDesc: Show lunar date and festivals in calendar view
calendarShowHolidayDesc: Show public holidays in calendar view (H)
calendarHolidayIcsUrlDesc: Set the ICS URL for holiday subscription
updateHolidayDesc: Click to update holiday data immediately
dayStartTimeDesc: Set the start scroll position of the day for calendar view, e.g., 06:00 (still shows full day)
confirmDeleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete project "${title}"?
confirmDeleteProjectTasks:
Do you want to delete all ${count} tasks in this project?

Select "Confirm" to delete all tasks, or "Cancel" to delete only the project.
importIcsDesc: Import tasks from an ICS file with support for batch setting project, tags and priority
importSuccess: ICS imported: added ${added}, updated ${updated}, total ${total} events
noValidEvents: No valid events found in ICS file
icsSubscriptionDesc: Subscribe to external ICS calendars and automatically sync tasks to the plugin
confirmDeleteSubscription: Are you sure to delete subscription "${name}"?
cannotEditSubscriptionTask: Subscription tasks cannot be edited, please modify in the original calendar
enableOutlinePrefixDesc: Add task status prefix to bound headings in outline (‚úÖ completed ‚è∞ pending), does not affect heading content
showPomodoroInSummaryDesc: When enabled, task summary will include Pomodoro focus time statistics
showHabitInSummaryDesc: When enabled, task summary will include habit check-in progress statistics
confirmDeletePomodoro: Are you sure you want to delete this pomodoro record?
confirmDeleteFilter: Are you sure you want to delete filter "${name}"?
vipLoginToUse: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please log in to your SiYuan account first to use the subscription
vipHowToJoinWechat: ‚ùì How to join the member-exclusive WeChat group
vipJoinWechatDesc: Send payment screenshot and WeChat ID to achuan-2@outlook.com, I will add you and pull you into the group
vipDiscountNotice1: ‚ö†Ô∏è Users who donated before Feb 23, 2026 can get a discount of 2x the total donation amount. Donors who gave over 50 RMB before Feb 23, 2026, and code PR contributors can apply for a lifetime membership. Send the donation/contribution screenshot and SiYuan Account ID to achuan-2@outlook.com to apply.
vipDiscountNotice2: ‚ö†Ô∏è SiYuan developers (whose works are in SiYuan bazaar or PR accepted) or students can enjoy a 40% discount on membership. Send proof to apply.
vipManualCheckBtn: I have paid, get activation code
vipActivationNotice1: The activation code is limited to the single tied SiYuan account and cannot be used for other users.
vipActivationNotice2: The activation code has no limit on activation times and can activate VIP features offline: other devices only need to sync workspace data or log in to the bound SiYuan account to use VIP features.
vipQueryException: Query exception, please try again later
vipQrcodeGenerated: QR code generated, please scan with Alipay
vipExceptionOccurred: Exception occurred, please try again later
vipTrialKeyObtained: Trial activation code obtained and filled automatically
vipGetTrialKeyFailed: Failed to get trial activation code
vipInvalidKeyOrNotBelong: Activation code is invalid or does not belong to the current user
vipOverseasTransferNotice: Scan the QR code below to transfer money via Wise, Western Union, etc. After successful payment, send your SiYuan account ID + payment screenshot to achuan-2@outlook.com to request your activation code.
audioDownloadSuccess: Download successful, audio saved to local storage
audioDownloadFailed: Failed to download audio, please check your network connection
openFolderNotSupported: Current client does not support opening plugin data folder
deletePluginDataDesc: Delete all plugin data files, this operation is irreversible
confirmDeletePluginData: Are you sure to delete all plugin data? This operation is irreversible!
exportIcsDesc: Export reminders as a standard ICS calendar file, which can be imported into Outlook, Google Calendar, and other calendar apps
manageSubscriptionsDesc: Manage ICS calendar subscriptions with support for setting project, category, priority and sync frequency
icsSyncDesc: Upload ICS files to the cloud to sync reminders across devices. Supports SiYuan server or S3 storage.
icsTaskFilterDesc: Select which tasks to export to the ICS file
icsFileNameDesc: Custom ICS filename (without .ics extension), leave empty to auto-generate as reminder-randomID
icsSyncMethodDesc: Select the sync method for ICS files
icsSyncEnabledDesc: When enabled, automatically generate and upload ICS files to the cloud at the configured interval
icsSyncIntervalDesc: Set the frequency for automatically syncing ICS files to the cloud
icsSilentUploadDesc: When enabled, scheduled ICS uploads will not show success notification messages
uploadIcsToCloud: Generate and Upload ICS to Cloud
uploadIcsToCloudDesc: Generate ICS file and immediately upload it to the cloud
icsCloudUrlDesc: Cloud URL automatically generated after successful upload
icsLastSyncAtDesc: Shows the time of the last successful ICS file upload
s3UseSiyuanConfigDesc: When enabled, SiYuan's S3 configuration will be used, no need to manually configure S3 parameters below
s3EndpointDesc: S3 service endpoint address, protocol prefix can be omitted (https:// added automatically)
s3StoragePathDesc: Storage path in S3, e.g.: /calendar/ or leave empty to store in root directory
s3ForcePathStyleDesc: Access file URL: Path-style: https://endpoint/bucket/key, Virtual hosted: https://bucket.endpoint/key
s3TlsVerifyDesc: Whether to verify TLS/SSL certificates, disabling allows connecting to services with self-signed certificates
s3CustomDomainDesc: Custom domain for generating external links, leave empty to use standard S3 URL
randomNotificationPopupWindowDesc: Shows a popup reminder in the center of the screen when a random break starts, and closes automatically when the break ends (global popup on desktop, SiYuan internal popup on other platforms)
groupDefaultHeadingLevel: Default Heading Level for Bound Block (Project Group)
groupDefaultHeadingLevelDesc: Set the default heading level when adding group-bound blocks
milestoneDefaultHeadingLevel: Default Heading Level for Bound Block (Project Milestone)
milestoneDefaultHeadingLevelDesc: Set the default heading level when adding heading milestones
pomodoroEndPopupWindowDesc: Shows a popup reminder in the center of the screen when the pomodoro work session ends (global popup on desktop, SiYuan internal popup on other platforms)
pleaseStopTimerFirst: Please stop the current timer before switching mode
pomodoroWorkEndDesc: Work session ended. Time to get up, walk around and drink some water!
invalidTimeFormat: Invalid time format, please use MM:SS format (e.g. 25:00)
noteNotExist: Note does not exist or has been deleted
enterDockMode: Entered dock mode, click the progress bar to restore
enterFullscreenMode: Entered fullscreen mode, press ESC or click the button in the top right to exit
editTimeNotAllowed: Please pause the timer before editing time
pomodoroWorkCompleted: Work pomodoro complete! Time to take a break~
pomodoroWorkEndAutoBreak: Work time ended! Starting break automatically
pomodoroBreakEndAutoWork: Break ended! Starting next pomodoro automatically
pomodoroBreakEndSwitchWork: Break ended! Switching to work time (not starting automatically)
pomodoroCompletedLongBreak: Work time ended! Completed ${count} pomodoros, starting long break
